## Replication files and codes


* Database on States and Institutions of Governance in Latin America (SIGLA) for more than 20 countries across the region is available [here](https://sigla.georgetown.domains/gateway/).

* Replication file for [Gelvez, J. D., & Johnson, M. (2023). Los nadies y las nadies: The Effect of Peacebuilding on Political Behavior in Colombia. Latin American Politics and Society, 1-28.](https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/latin-american-politics-and-society/article/los-nadies-y-las-nadies-the-effect-of-peacebuilding-on-political-behavior-in-colombia/055EF9BF86DFA9C71BF96B437E1557D0?utm_source=hootsuite&utm_medium=twitter&utm_campaign=LAP_Nov23) is available [here](https://github.com/juangelvezf/The-Nobodies). 

* Replication file for [Gelvez, J. D., Mantilla, C., & Nieto, M. P. (Forthcoming). Rewards, Sanctions, and Trust in the Police: Evidence from Colombia.](https://osf.io/aebxy/) is available [here](https://osf.io/v78zb/)
